nodes.text: The SR-78 Bulwark Defense Droid was a three-legged battle droid used by the Shroud, a freelance spy active during the Galactic War. The deactivated SR-78 was stationed at the Shroud's factory on the moon Nar Shaddaa.

The SR-78 Bulwark Defense Droid appears as a non-hostile character in the final macrobinoculars mission—"The Shroud Revealed" for Republic players and "All the Pieces" for Imperials— in Rise of the Hutt Cartel, the first Digital Expansion for the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
